name: OrthoRoute GPU Autorouter
description: High-performance GPU-accelerated autorouter using process isolation
description_full: OrthoRoute is a high-performance GPU-accelerated PCB autorouter that leverages NVIDIA CUDA through CuPy for parallel routing algorithms using KiCad's modern IPC API. Features include GPU-accelerated wavefront routing, process isolation for maximum KiCad stability, real-time visualization, and support for multi-layer boards.

actions.name: Simple Button Test
actions.description: Simple test to verify IPC plugin button execution
